name: Croakr
description:
You may have heard the myth; 

Put a frog in boiling water and it jumps out, but if you put it in tepid water slowly bringing it to a boil the frog stays put.

This is the frog boiling human version of that, only the humans are in a pool and there's heavy metal playing. Frannie the frog wants to make a human soup for their hot date off Croakr.

Bring the pool to a boil, use the up/down arrow keys to increase the heat but don't be too eager or the people will bounce out.

P.S. the myth is BS.
